name: fsuppimpd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))

stmt.origin: simprd(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), wfun(c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn)))

body.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))

comment: A finitely supported function is a function with a finite support. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
